setFromHeader()

setFromHeader(string $text, string $default_url) : void

Parses the value of a "Set-Cookie" header and sets the cookie from it.

Parameters

string $text

The Set-Cookie text string value.
string $default_url

The URL to use when setting the secure, host and path property defaults.
